getAccessibilityClassName().Description: Return the class name of this object to be used for accessibility purposes. Subclasses should only override this if they are implementing something that should be seen as a completely new class of view when used by accessibility, unrelated to the class it is deriving from. This is used to fill in @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityNodeInfo#setClassName_E@.
